dogs.name: Shiba Inu
dogs.description: The Shiba Inu is the smallest of the six original and distinct spitz breeds of dog from Japan. A small, agile dog that copes very well with mountainous terrain, the Shiba Inu was originally bred for hunting.

dogs.name: Chiuaua
dogs.description: Chihuahua is a breed of small dog originally from Mexico. It is one of the smallest breeds in the world, won in measures with the Small Russian dog.

dogs.name: Pastor Alem√£o
dogs.description: German shepherd or Alsace wolf is a canine breed from Germany. Originally it was used as a herding dog. Nowadays it is more used as guard dog and police dog.

dogs.name: Poodle
dogs.description: Poodle, according to the International Cinological Federation comes from France, because it was claimed, but it was raised a long time ago in Central European countries like Germany. Originally, it was used as a hunting dog for waterfowl.

dogs.name: Dachshund
dogs.description: Dachshund or teckel, also called a sausage dog, is a breed of dog from Germany. This breed is part of an FCI group due to its wide range of sizes and coat: standard, miniature and kaninchen; long, smooth and hard hair.
